articles.author: Joe  Walsh
articles.title: Trump lashes out at Leonard Leo, legal activist who helped him pick Supreme Court justices: "Probably hates America" - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump attacked Leonard Leo, a onetime ally and key adviser on judicial picks.
articles.content: President Trump attacked the powerful conservative legal activist Leonard Leo late Thursday, calling the former Federalist Society leader who once advised the president on Supreme Court picks a "bad … [+4093 chars]

articles.author: Ed Cara
articles.title: Leprosy’s Origins Are Even Weirder Than We Thought - Gizmodo
articles.description: New research complicates the narrative of how leprosy reached the Americas.
articles.content: One of the world’s oldest diseases has an even more complex history than expected. Research out today reveals that a form of leprosy was stalking people in the Americas long before Europeans arrived.… [+4553 chars]
